title: AIML — Senior Backend Software Engineer, ML Innovation
summary: Build Machine Learning & Experimentation platforms to empower Apple engineers in delivering great user experiences. Our team is solving key challenges in operating ML workflows for data collection, deployments, and experimentation at the scale of billions of devices. Our work is complex, mission critical and highly visible. If this interests your creative and development chops, come join our team!
description: You will be responsible for designing, implementing features & building platforms to enable on-device and device/server side combined ML workflows. For example, build service to rollout / rollback experiments to billions of devices in just few hours, build highly scalable systems to process billions of events daily. You will be responsible for setting technical direction for the team, driving engineering quality for the platforms and providing mentorship to junior engineers. You will collaborate with cross-functional partners, customers and the team to build platform roadmap for next 2-3 years.
key_qualifications:
5+ years of software development experience working in the industry, having shipped & operated multiple products/services
Experience building scalable micro-services
Experience with Object oriented programming languages like Java / Python
Experience with Kubernetes, Kafka or similar technologies
Experience working in large cross-functional projects
Experience with SQL / NoSQL databases
Experience with mentoring junior engineers and defining/driving best practices for technical design, code reviews, etc.
Experience with Javascript and UI frameworks/libraries like React, Ember, Angular, D3 is a plus
education_experience: BS in Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Computer Science, or equivalent experience.
additional_requirements:
Experience with Machine Learning platforms is a plus
Experience with A/B Testing is a plus
